login.loginFailure: Sorry that isn't right. Try again.
login.title: Login

kba.description: Select security question(s) below. These questions will help us verify your identity if you forget your password.
kba.question: Question

recoveryCodes.subheader: Now you can use your device as a second step when signing in to your account.
recoveryCodes.subtitle: Don’t get locked out of your account
recoveryCodes.info: If you lose your device, or don’t have it with you, a recovery code is the only way to sign in to your account with 2-step verification enabled. It’s strongly recommended that you print and store these codes in a safe place.
recoveryCodes.infoEmphasis: Each code can only be used once.

webAuthn.authenticateInfo: Use your device to verify your identity.
webAuthn.failedInfo: Don’t worry – you can still access your account using a recovery code.
webAuthn.registerInfo: Your device will be used to verify your identity.
